title: Sefer HaParnas
enDesc: Sefer HaParnas is a 13th or 14th-century collection of traditions and rulings of Rabbi Meir of Rothenburg (known as the Maharam of Rothenburg), compiled by his student, Rabbi Moshe Parnas. The work was well-known and quoted often by German scholars in the 15th century, but was then lost and not published until the late 19th century.f Rothenburg.
heDesc: ליקוט של פסקי הלכה ומנהגים של ר' מאיר מרוטנברג (מהר"ם), כפי שרשמם תלמידו ר' משה פרנס.
enShortDesc: 13th or 14th-century collection of traditions and rulings of the Maharam of Rothenburg.
heShortDesc: אוסף מנהגים ופסקי הלכה המיוחסים למהר"ם מרוטנברג, חובר במאה ה-13 או 14 .
